Corpus_Christi.Richard King High School:
Richard King High School, or King as it is often referred to, is one of five secondary schools that are part of the Corpus Christi Independent School District in Corpus Christi, Texas (USA). It is one of the largest high schools within the Corpus Christi area and is classified as a 5A school by the UIL. In 2013, the school was rated "Met Standard" by the Texas Education Agency.


== Administrative ==
King's operating budget for the 2005-2006 school year was $12,151,016.00.
